full_summary:
### Government Tender: Facility Management Support Services

#### Government Contracting Agency Information
* **Contracting Agency:** VIA Rail Canada Inc.
* **Agency Address:** 3 Place Ville-Marie, Suite 500, Montreal, Quebec H3B 2C9 Canada
* **Agency Contact:** Gessy Houle
  + Contact Email: [Gessy_Houle@viarail.ca](mailto:Gessy_Houle@viarail.ca)
  + Contact Phone: (514) 871-6071

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference ID:** MX-42980762301
* **Solicitation Number:** 202310005
* **Publication Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024 11:00 EST
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding

#### Notice URL
* **English:** <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2729129563/abstract?language=EN>
* **French:** <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2729129563/abstract?language=FR>

#### Tender Description
VIA Rail seeks to establish a partnership with a facility management firm that provides a complete range of facility and asset management services to support the management of its geographically extensive asset portfolio. The successful partner will need to provide call center, CMMIS, asset maintenance (self-performance or procurement), and other services. Bidding documents are available on Merx.com and may be subject to fees.

#### Trade Agreements

VIA Rail Canada Inc. is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 名無しさん
